ygData.subject: Book XXXIII on test server. Spoiler pics!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello folks! This post is dedicated to all those hard working Gnomes who put their money where there mouth was when we were trying to find the recipe for the
ygData.messageBody:
Hello folks!

This post is dedicated to all those hard working Gnomes who put their money where there mouth was when we were trying to find the recipe for the fishing pole.

Its also dedicated to those other bastards who wont just keep their mouths shut and feel they have to tweak our noses because they have info that we dont. =)

Here are pics of the books with the 'aqua lung' recipe, they are only on the test server at the moment.

SPOILERS!!

http://www.fizzban.com/EQpics/page1-2.jpg
http://www.fizzban.com/EQpics/page3-4.jpg
http://www.fizzban.com/EQpics/page5-6.jpg
http://www.fizzban.com/EQpics/page7-8.jpg

Cheers,

"FizzWizz" of tunare
